com.github.daytron.flipit.map.creator.model

Class GraphicsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.daytron.flipit.map.creator.model.GraphicsManager

  • public class GraphicsManager
extends Object
    The class responsible for the graphics display of tiles on the canvas.
    Author:
    Ryan Gilera ryangilera@gmail.com

      • isInsideTheGrid

        public boolean isInsideTheGrid(double x_pos,
                               double y_pos)
        Checks whether the mouse click event is inside the map grid.
        Parameters:
        x_pos - The x mouse clicked coordinate
        y_pos - The y mouse clicked coordinate
        Returns:
        true if the position is inside the map, otherwise false

      • getTilePosition

        public int[] getTilePosition(double x_pos,
                             double y_pos)
        Extracts grid position from mouseclick coordinates. Uses a simple binary search.
        Parameters:
        x_pos - Mouseclick x coordinate
        y_pos - Mouseclick y coordinate
        Returns:
        Returns tile position [column,row]
